answers.answer: Vaginal birth after C section. I'm curious to hear too, have nine s he filed 13 days from now!

My sister and sil both had successful vbacs. My sister's c section was an emergency due to preeclampsia, and my sil had one because her baby was breech. My sister told me that having a Dr who wants you to have a successful vbac is the best thing you can do for yourself. And of course there had to have been enough time in between births for total healing to happen.
Ok thank you I really all appropriate! The story!!!!
I have had 4 vbacs and hopefully this will be my 5th. Make sure you have a very supportive doctor :)

question: Hi ladies! I'm looking for anyone women that has or maybe is going to have a VBAC?... Of course I'm scared but please give any kind of advice.. greatly appreciated! Thanks.
title: Any ladies with a successful VBAC story?
